data.name: Comfort
data.detailed_description: Comfort is a 3D Horror & Puzzle game in which you have to solve puzzles to fight different inner demons. During that you are chased by a creature that represents your inner Couch Potato. Every puzzle has its own location. On most locations you will find a note that with a little hint or a instruction to your task. Time to time paranormal things can happen/appear that will distract you from your puzzle. For every puzzle you will have to walk trough the level and try to find what you need (Items or Hints). Most puzzles include interacting with different items. You can take, place and hold items to solve the puzzles.
